thread.title: Stay at a Cancun Resort for 50 Percent Off with a $100 Credit!
thread.title_full: Stay at a Cancun Resort for 50 Percent Off with a $100 Credit!

title: Stay at a Cancun Resort for 50 Percent Off with a $100 Credit!
text:
Stay at a Cancun Resort for 50 Percent Off with a $100 Credit! September 9, 2015 
Courtesy: Westin Resort & Spa 
The deal: Stay at the recently renovated, 4-star Westin Cancun Resort & Spa for $138 to $178 per night, saving up to 50 percent off peak rates, plus a $100 credit for booking with a MasterCard. (There’s a minimum five-night stay and you must pay with a MasterCard.) 
When you can go: Most dates through Dec. 15. 
Why we love it: The price can’t be beat for this kind of resort in Cancun, and the Westin Cancun’s laid-back nature makes it especially ideal for families. You’re also likely to get a great view, since most rooms overlook the water. 
What you can do there: On-site options include water sports, tennis, and a fitness studio. Golf fanatics can find a championship course nearby, and if it’s culture you’re after, take a day trip to explore Mayan ruins. 
How long does this deal last? Sept. 15 (subject to availability) 
This deal was provided by Travelzoo Tumblr
